GR14ss4_krsu:5465: tad-ālayam eva viśinaṣṭi smṛtyeti | sākṣād adhunā vyakta-tad-
GR14ss4_krsu:5466: darśanābhāvāt smṛtyety uktam | yaḥ svayam evambhūtas tasya tv anyathā
GR14ss4_krsu:5467: sambhāvitatvam api nāstīti | evam eva viṣṇu-purāṇe -
GR14ss4_krsu:5468: plāvayāmāsa tāṃ śūnyāṃ dvārakāṃ ca mahodadhiḥ |
GR14ss4_krsu:5469: nityaṃ sannihitas tatra bhagavān keśavo yataḥ ||
GR14ss4_krsu:5471: viṣṇu-krīḍānvitaṃ sthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā pāpāt pramucyate || [ViP 5.38.9-10] iti |
GR14ss4_krsu:5472: [Vṛ. adds here: tathaiva śrī-hari-vaṃśe yādavān pratīndra-preṣitasya
GR14ss4_krsu:5476: ity atra ātmasāt kṛtvā iti na tu tyaktveti | Vṛ. addition ends.]
GR14ss4_krsu:5479: tad evam aprakaṭa-prakaṭa-līlayoḥ samanvayo darśitaḥ | ete eva pādmottara-
GR14ss4_krsu:5480: khaṇḍe bhoga-līlā-śabdābhyām ucyete - bhoge nitya-sthitis tasya līlāṃ
GR14ss4_krsu:5481: saṃharate kadā [BhP 6.226.9] ity ādinā | yāṃ kadācit saṃharate sā līlety
GR14ss4_krsu:5483: vāhitvena balavattaratvāt ubhaya-līlaikī-bhāvānantaram api tanmayas teṣām
GR14ss4_krsu:5485: yādavānāṃ sa tāvan nūnam evaṃ sambhavati | aho sarva-daivānya-jīvātūnām
GR14ss4_krsu:5486: asmākam īśitā śrī-kṛṣṇākhyo bhagavān ayaṃ nānā-līlāmṛta-nirjharaiḥ
GR14ss4_krsu:5487: sāndrānanda-camatkāram āsvādayituṃ yādava-śikhāmaṇer nityam eva pitṛ-
GR14ss4_krsu:5488: bhāva-samṛddhasya śrīmad-ānakadundubher gṛhe sva-janmanā svān svān
GR14ss4_krsu:5491: brahmādyair api duradhigame śrī-mathurā-nāmni śrī-dvārakā-nāmni vā
GR14ss4_krsu:5493: (page 106) vibhrājate iti | so'yam abhimānaḥ śrī-vṛndāvane tu nija-nija-
GR14ss4_krsu:5499: uparako'pi muhur anukūlena vidhinā teṣāṃ svayam eva vināśa-pūrvakaṃ
GR14ss4_krsu:5500: cakorebhyaḥ candramā ivāsmabhyaṃ vitīrṇa evāsīt | yo'sau tādṛśa-tadīya-
GR14ss4_krsu:5501: mahā-guṇa-gaṇād eva parituṣyadbhir muni-devair iva dattena kenāpi
GR14ss4_krsu:5502: prabhāveṇa muhur api vipad-gaṇād ātma-kleśam agaṇayann eva naḥ
GR14ss4_krsu:5506: abhivindamāno yad yad api mādṛśām abhilaṣitaṃ tad-atītā vā tat tad api
GR14ss4_krsu:5507: pratilavam apy āścarya-bhūtaṃ nija-mādhurya-varyam ullāsitavān | yo'sau
GR14ss4_krsu:5509: api ca rājanyāsura-saṅgha-saṃharaṇāya yadu-purīṃ prasthitavān | yo'sau
GR14ss4_krsu:5510: kāryānurodhena tatraiva cirāya tiṣṭhata ātmano viprayogena satapta-buddhīn
GR14ss4_krsu:5511: uddhavādibhir asmān asakṛd āśvāsayāmāsa | yo'sau punar-utkaṇṭhā-koṭi-
GR14ss4_krsu:5514: tathāvidhān asmān ātma-sannidhau māsa-katipayaṃ saṃvāsya parama-
GR14ss4_krsu:5515: svajanayā mudhaiva kṛtābhimānebhyo yādavebhyo nigūḍhāṃ kām api sneha-
GR14ss4_krsu:5516: mudrām asmāsu samudghaṭayya bhavatām evāham iti vyañjanayā muhur
GR14ss4_krsu:5517: evāsmān abhitaḥ sandhukṣitavān | yo'sau śrī-vṛndāvanam evāsmākam
GR14ss4_krsu:5518: ātmano'pi paramam abhīṣṭam iti niṣṭaṅkya śapathādinā nija-jhaṭity-
GR14ss4_krsu:5519: āgamane visrabhya sāgraham asmān atraiva prasthāpitavān | so'yam aho
GR14ss4_krsu:5521: mocana-vyavasāyān āśaṅkya jhaṭiti svayam eva gokulaṃ sāmpratam āgamya
GR14ss4_krsu:5524: tatra ca pratikṣaṇam api nava-navī-kṛtenānanya-sādhāraṇena kenāpi sneha-
GR14ss4_krsu:5533: tena vayam aho samaya-gamanāgamanam api sambhālayituṃ na pārayāma iti |
GR14ss4_krsu:5534: etad-anusāreṇa dvārakātaḥ samāgate śrī-kṛṣṇe keṣāñcid vraja-vāsinām eva
GR14ss4_krsu:5535: tadānīntanam ullāsa-vacanaṃ jayati jananivāsa [BhP 10.90.48] ity-ādikaṃ śrī-
GR14ss4_krsu:5538: vicitrārthatvaṃ, vidvat-kāma-dhenu-rūpatvāt | tathā hi jayati ity ādi |
GR14ss4_krsu:5539: ko'pi so'yam asmākaṃ jīvana-koṭi-priyatamo viṣvak-pracāreṇa śrī-
GR14ss4_krsu:5540: vṛndāvanasyaiva (page 107) viśeṣataḥ sthāvarāṇāṃ jaṅgamānāṃ ca tad-
GR14ss4_krsu:5541: virahād yad duḥkhaṃ tan-nihantā jayati sarvotkarṣeṇa vartate | arthāc chrī-
GR14ss4_krsu:5542: vṛndāvana eva | śrī-vṛndāvanasya sthāvarāṇām api bhāvo varṇita eva,
GR14ss4_krsu:5543: kevalenaiva bhāvena ity ādinā | kena viśiṣṭaḥ ? susmitena śrī-mukhena |
GR14ss4_krsu:5544: etena sadātanam ānandaika-rasatvaṃ sveṣu sadaiva suprasannatvaṃ ca tasya
GR14ss4_krsu:5545: prakāśitam | kiṃ kurvan ? vraja-rūpaṃ yat puraṃ tat-sambandhinyo yā vanitā
GR14ss4_krsu:5547: premānandoparivirājamānatvāt tāsāṃ kāmas tu devaḥ parama-divya-rūpas
GR14ss4_krsu:5549: nanu śrī-devakyāḥ putro'yam ity evaṃ vadanti, tat kathaṃ yusmākam
GR14ss4_krsu:5550: atrāsmadīyatvenābhimānaḥ ? tatrāha devakyāṃ janmeti vādo mithyaiva loka-
GR14ss4_krsu:5551: khyātir yasya saḥ | tarhi kathaṃ vāsudeva iti nāmety āśaṅkyāha jananivāso
GR14ss4_krsu:5552: janānāṃ svajanānām asmākaṃ nivāsatvād āśrayatvād eva tathābhidhīyata
GR14ss4_krsu:5553: ity arthaḥ | svajaneṣv asmāsu kṛta-vāsatvād eva vā | tataś cādhikaraṇe kartari
GR14ss4_krsu:5554: vauṇādiko vāsuḥ | sa ca dīvyati krīḍatīti devaś ca sa iti vigrahaḥ | prāg ayaṃ
GR14ss4_krsu:5555: vāsudevasya [BhP 10.8.14] ity ādikā śrī-gargoktir api nāsmabhyaṃ bhātīti
GR14ss4_krsu:5556: bhāvaḥ | kim artham asau devakī-janma-vādo'bhūd ity āśaṅkāyām āha -
GR14ss4_krsu:5557: yadu-varāḥ pariṣat-sahāya-rūpā yatra tādṛśaṃ yathā syāt tathā, svair dorbhir
GR14ss4_krsu:5558: bhuja-prāyair arjunādibhir adharmaṃ tat pracuraṃ duṣṭa-kulam asyan
GR14ss4_krsu:5559: nihantuṃ, lakṣaṇa-hetvoḥ, kriyāyāḥ śatṛ-pratyaya-smaraṇāt | tasyām ātma-
GR14ss4_krsu:5560: janmani khyāpite te te sahāyā bhaviṣyantīty evam anusandhāyety arthaḥ |
GR14ss4_krsu:5561: tathoktaṃ kaṃsa-vadhānantaraṃ śrī-kṛṣṇena śrī-vrajeśvaraṃ prati jñātīn vo
GR14ss4_krsu:5562: draṣṭum eṣyāmo vidhāya suhṛdāṃ sukham [BhP 10.45.23] iti | atra
GR14ss4_krsu:5567: atha teṣāṃ tena paramānandena samayānanusandhānam apy uktam vrajati na
GR14ss4_krsu:5568: hi yatrāpi samayaḥ [BrahmaS 5.56] iti | atas teṣāṃ śrī-kṛṣṇāgamana-
GR14ss4_krsu:5569: paramānanda-mattānām adyaivāyam āgata itīva sadā hṛdi vartate |
GR14ss4_krsu:5570: [Vṛ. adds here:] sa eṣa yadvad aprakaṭa-svārasikyāṃ prakaṭa-līlā-gata-bhāva-
GR14ss4_krsu:5571: praveśas tathā tad-vaibhava-rūpāsu mantropāsanāmayīṣv api sva-sva-
GR14ss4_krsu:5573: eva | ubhayatrāpy asau samāna eva darśitaḥ | pādma-pātāla-khaṇḍe go-gopa-
GR14ss4_krsu:5574: gopikā-saṅge yatra krīḍati kaṃsahā iti govinda gopījana-vallabheśa
GR14ss4_krsu:5575: kaṃsāsuraghna ity ābhyām | evaṃ yathā svārasikyām iva mantra-mayyām api
GR14ss4_krsu:5576: nandanandanatvam anugacched evaṃ śrūyate - sakala-loka-maṅgalo nanda-
GR14ss4_krsu:5577: gopa-tanayo devatā ity atra gautamīya-tantre dvitīyādhyāye nandanandana
GR14ss4_krsu:5578: ity uktaḥ ity atra ca | [Vṛ. addition ends.]
GR14ss4_krsu:5580: antardhāna-līlā-dvitīyasyaikyaṃ varṇitam | tatra yadyapi pūrva-pūrvam api
GR14ss4_krsu:5581: tādṛśa-bhāvas teṣām anādita evānuvartate tathāpi tam eva navanavīkṛtya
GR14ss4_krsu:5582: samuddīpayituṃ punaḥ punar avatāra iti jñeyam |
GR14ss4_krsu:5583: tad evaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇasya svayaṃ bhagavattvaṃ darśitam | tatrāpi śrī-gokule tat-
GR14ss4_krsu:5584: prakāśātiśayo dṛśyate | sa caiśvarya-gatas tāvat satya-jñānānantānanda-rasa-
GR14ss4_krsu:5586: pūtanāyā api sākṣān mātṛ-gati-dāne | mādhurya-gataś ca |
GR14ss4_krsu:5590: atra sthite'pi sarvato'pi prema-varīyasīnāṃ tāsāṃ tat-pāda-sparśa-saubhāgye
GR14ss4_krsu:5594: yad go-dvija-druma-mṛgān pulakāny abibhrat || [BhP 10.29.40] ity ādiṣu |
GR14ss4_krsu:5595: ato līlā-gataś cāsau ślāghyate pitarau nānvavindetāṃ kṛṣṇodārārbhake hitam
GR14ss4_krsu:5596: [BhP 10.8.47] ity ādiṣu | atas tadīyānām apy utkarṣa uktaḥ vṛndāvanaṃ
GR14ss4_krsu:5597: govardhanaṃ yamunā-pulināni ca [BhP 10.11.36] vīkṣyāmīty ādau | tataḥ
GR14ss4_krsu:5598: parikarāṇāṃ tu aho bhāgyam aho bhāgyam [BhP 10.14.32] ity ādau | itthaṃ
GR14ss4_krsu:5599: satām [BhP 10.12.11] ity ādau, nandaḥ kim akarot [BhP 10.8.43] ity ādau, etāḥ
GR14ss4_krsu:5600: param [BhP 10.47.51] ity ādau, gopyas tapaḥ kim acaran [BhP 10.44.14] ity
GR14ss4_krsu:5601: ādau | tatrāpi tatrātiśuśubhe tābhiḥ [BhP 10.33.6] ity ādau ca tāsu
GR14ss4_krsu:5602: prakāśātiśaya-sīmā darśitā | tataḥ sarvāsv api tāsu anayārādhito nūnaṃ
GR14ss4_krsu:5603: bhagavān harir īśvaraḥ [BhP 10.30.28] ity ādibhiḥ | prema-varīyastvena
GR14ss4_krsu:5604: prasiddhāyāṃ śrī-rādhikāyāṃ tu kim uteti jñeyam | atra cedaṃ tattvam |
GR14ss4_krsu:5605: dvitīye sandarbhe khalu paramatvena śrī-bhagavantaṃ nirūpya tasya śakti-
GR14ss4_krsu:5606: dvayī nirūpitā | tatra prathamā śrī-vaiṣṇavānāṃ śrī-bhagavad-upāsyā
GR14ss4_krsu:5607: tadīya-svarūpa-bhūtā yan mayy eva khalu tasya sā bhagavattā | dvitīyā cātha
GR14ss4_krsu:5608: teṣāṃ jagadvad-upekṣaṇīyā māyā-lakṣaṇā, yan mayy eva khalu tasya
GR14ss4_krsu:5609: jagattā | tatra pūrvasyāṃ śaktau śaktimati bhagavac-chabdaval-lakṣmī-śabdaḥ
GR14ss4_krsu:5610: prayujyata ity api dvitīya eva darśitam | tato'smin sandarbhe tu sa ca bhagavān
GR14ss4_krsu:5611: śrī-kṛṣṇākhya eveti nirdhārite tadīyā svarūpa-śaktis tu kim ākhyeti
GR14ss4_krsu:5612: nirdhāryam | tatra dvayor api puryoḥ śrī-mahisākhyā jñeyā | mathurāyām
GR14ss4_krsu:5613: apy aprakaṭa-līlāyāṃ śrutau rukmiṇyāḥ prasiddher anyāsām upalakṣaṇāt |
GR14ss4_krsu:5616: purā kṛṣṇo mahātejā yadā prabhāsam āgataḥ |
GR14ss4_krsu:5619: lakṣam ekaṃ tathā ṣaṣṭhir ete kṛṣṇa-sutāḥ priye || ity upakramya,
GR14ss4_krsu:5620: tato gopyo mahā-devi vidyāyāḥ ṣoḍaśa smṛtāḥ |
GR14ss4_krsu:5621: tāsāṃ nāmāni te vakṣye tāni hy ekamanāḥ śṛṇu ||
GR14ss4_krsu:5622: lambinī candrikā kāntā krūrā śāntā mahodayā |
GR14ss4_krsu:5624: śubhadā śobhanā puṇyā haṃsasyaitāḥ kalā kramāt |
GR14ss4_krsu:5625: haṃsa eva mataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ paramātmā janārdanaḥ ||
GR14ss4_krsu:5627: candra-rūpī mataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kalā-rūpās tu tāḥ smṛtāḥ ||
GR14ss4_krsu:5630: ṣoḍaśaiva kalā yās tu gopī-rūpā varāṇane |
GR14ss4_krsu:5632: evaṃ te kathitaṃ devi rahasyaṃ jñāna-sambhavam |
GR14ss4_krsu:5633: ya evaṃ veda puruṣaḥ sa jñeyo vaiṣṇavo budhaiḥ || [108.5-8, 10-16] iti |
GR14ss4_krsu:5634: atra gopyo rājñyaḥ ity arthaḥ | gopo bhūpe'pi iti nāma-liṅgānuśāsanāt |
GR14ss4_krsu:5635: lambinī avatāra-śaktiḥ | supūrva-vimalā suvimalā | haṃsaśītety atra prāptasya
GR14ss4_krsu:5636: haṃsayety asya vācyam āha haṃsa eveti | sa ca candra-rūpī candra-
GR14ss4_krsu:5637: dṛṣṭāntenoddeśya ity arthaḥ | kalā-rūpā iti tāś ca śaktayaś ca
GR14ss4_krsu:5638: candrasyāmṛtety ādi-kalā-dṛṣṭāntenoddeśyā ity arthaḥ | anuktām antimāṃ
GR14ss4_krsu:5639: mahā-śaktim āha sampūrṇeti | seyaṃ tu (page 109) kalā-samaṣṭi-rūpā jñeyā |
GR14ss4_krsu:5640: dṛṣṭāntopapādanāya candrasya tādṛśatvam āha pratipad iti | āsu etat-tulyāsu
GR14ss4_krsu:5641: kalāsu | vivakṣitam āha ṣoḍaśaiveti ṣoḍaśānām eva vidyā-rūpatvāt | etad-
GR14ss4_krsu:5646: pratyāyakatvāt | mṛtyur bhoja-pater itivad durjana-vitrāsakatvāt, asatāṃ śāstā
GR14ss4_krsu:5647: itivat tadīya-śoka-hetutvād eva ca tat-tan-niruktir upapadyate | yathā
GR14ss4_krsu:5648: prakāśaika-rūpāyā eva sūrya-kānter ulūkeṣu tama-ādi-vyañjakateti | ataś
GR14ss4_krsu:5649: candra-rūpī mataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kalā-rūpās tu tāḥ smṛtāḥ iti sphuṭam eva
GR14ss4_krsu:5651: tad evaṃ tāsāṃ svarūpa-śakti-bhūtatve lakṣmītvaṃ sidhyaty eva | tad evam
GR14ss4_krsu:5657: ṭīkā ca -ramābhir lakṣmyā aṃśa-bhūtābhir ity eṣā | svarūpa-śaktitvād eva
GR14ss4_krsu:5658: reme ity uktam | ataeva nijaḥ svakīyaḥ paramānanda-śakti-vṛtti-viśeṣodaya-
GR14ss4_krsu:5659: rūpa-prema-viśeṣa-svarūpo yaḥ kāmas tena sampluto vyāpta iti ||
GR14ss4_krsu:5667: pracura-bhū-śaktitvaṃ jñeyam | svayaṃ lakṣmīs tu śrī-rukmiṇī --
GR14ss4_krsu:5669: rukmiṇyā ramayopetaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ śriyaḥ patim || [BhP 10.54.6]
GR14ss4_krsu:5670: ity ādiṣu tasyām eva bhūriśaḥ prasiddheḥ | ataḥ svayaṃ lakṣmītvenaiva
GR14ss4_krsu:5672: asyaiva bhāryā bhavituṃ rukmiṇy arhati nāparā |
GR14ss4_krsu:5673: asāv apy anavadyātmā bhaiṣmyāḥ samucitaḥ patiḥ || [BhP 10.53.37]
GR14ss4_krsu:5677: tathā tāṃ rukmiṇīṃ śriyam ity ādau yā līlayā dhṛta-tanor anurūpa-rūpā
GR14ss4_krsu:5679: ataḥ svayaṃ bhagavato'nurūpatvena svayaṃ lakṣmītvaṃ siddham eva | ataeva
GR14ss4_krsu:5680: vaidarbhīṃ bhīṣmaka-sutāṃ śriyo mātrāṃ svayaṃvare [BhP 10.52.16] ity atra
GR14ss4_krsu:5681: māti antarbhavatyasyām iti mātrā-padaṃ bāhulyād adhikaraṇa evauṇādikaṃ
GR14ss4_krsu:5682: jñeyam | kārtsnye avadhāraṇe mātram itivat | tataś ca vaikuṇṭha-prasiddhāyā
GR14ss4_krsu:5683: lakṣmyā antarbhāvāspadatvād eṣaiva lakṣmīḥ sarvataḥ paripūrṇety arthaḥ |
GR14ss4_krsu:5687: kva sve mahimny abhirato bhagavāṃs try-adhīśaḥ
GR14ss4_krsu:5689: iti tasyā evoktis tatra nijāṃśābhāsam eva dainyena svaṃ matvoktam iti
GR14ss4_krsu:5690: mantavyam | yad vā, guṇā gauṇī prakṛtiḥ svabhāvo yasyāḥ sā apakṛṣṭa-
GR14ss4_krsu:5691: rūpety arthaḥ | yathā tatraiva, syān me tavāṅghrir araṇaṃ sṛtibhir
GR14ss4_krsu:5693: dainyoktiḥ | atra daiva-prerito vāstavo'rthas tv evaṃ (page 110) he'ravinda-
GR14ss4_krsu:5694: locana bhagavatas tavāsadṛśy aham ity etad | yad bhavān āha nanu niścitaṃ
GR14ss4_krsu:5695: tat tv evaṃ vakṣyamāṇa-prakārakaṃ na tv anya-prakārakam | tathaivāha sve
GR14ss4_krsu:5696: svarūpa-bhūte mahimni aiśvaryādāv abhirato bhagavān kva kutrānyatra,
GR14ss4_krsu:5697: tathāhaṃ tā te guṇā aiśvaryādaya eva prakṛtiḥ svarūpaṃ yasyās tathābhūtā
